name: All Aliens Must Die!
description:
Game created in 3 days for the ScoreSpace x 8 bits to Infinity - Arcade Controls Jam

Game Jam Guidelines: Must have Arcade controls (joystick and 1 button only), must contain a highscore table, and the theme is Swarms. 

Controls:

  • Gamepad: Joystick + A Button
  • Keyboard: WASD/Arrow Keys + Spacebar
